TextBody:
Hello Nigel,

Thank you for reaching out!

This ticket is regarding your situation encountered with the new devices added to an endpoint.

All the details collected in the meeting have been forwarded to our R&D team for further investigations.

As soon as an update will be provided, I will inform you accordingly.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.endpointprotector.com

daniel.anton@endpointprotector.com
